title: Escapism
description: A university student, Xenia decides to devote all her time to some serious soul searching, literally. Along her shocking path to self realization, the first strange thing Xenia discovers is she’s a Diplozoe. She meets Nicholas, a Diplozoe who guides her at a popular nightclub, Styx into a mystical transitory world, a portal between two worlds where the souls of the living and dead intermingle. The second strange thing is Nicholas is part dead. The third strange thing is she is in love with the dead guy. Leave it to Xenia to fall for a dead guy. Two travelers seek Xenia for guidance. There’s a problem though. Something or someone is hindering her awakening…
author: Maria Dee
